creditline: Gift of the John C. Weber Collection
description: short, black metal, wide mouth jar; flared lip has low-relief design of rolling waves; two raised lines encircling widest diameter at center of body; brown storage box with inscriptions on sides and lid; green/floral cloth wrap not original to piece (tag on wrap describes a different object)
inscription: On box cover, front UR: 古銅建水; front LL: [Yoshiyuki?]; back side of base: 十九[号?]; right side: 古銅大建水; wooden tag on inside wrapper, front: セト黒箆; back: 瀬戸黒
title: Wastewater jar
